author: sseth
msg: MAPREDUCE-4696. Fixed a failing unit test - TestMRServerPorts. (Contributed by Gopal V)

author: pburba
msg: (add_dir_recursive): Make the CONFIG_AUTOPROPS argument just a
apr_hash_t * rather than a apr_hash_t ** output argument.  We were
passing CONFIG_AUTOPROPS to recursive calls within unversioned trees,
which we still do, but no callers, which didn't already have a non-null
CONFIG_AUTOPROPS, were using using the output argument its callees
provided -- A good thing too since it was allocated in the callee's
iterpool!.  As the only use of the result pool was to allocate
CONFIG_AUTOPROPS we can remove that arg.
(add): Just pass NULL as CONFIG_AUTOPROPS at the start of any recursion.

author: jfthomps
msg: changed comment for $pemkey to say that won't ever have to type it
